relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclera anicteric, MMM, oropharynx clear, EOMI, PERRL
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 + S2, no murmurs, rubs, gallops
relevant_findings.lungs: Mild wheezing throughout with slight rhonchi at right base
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, non-tender, non-distended, bowel sounds present, no organomegaly, no rebound or guarding
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis or edema
relevant_findings.neurological: CNII-XII intact, strength upper/lower extremities grossly normal, 2+ reflexes bilaterally
